name: Cryptus
description:
A short game created for Ludum Dare 33 about a mushroom which learns an important lesson.

Controls:

-arrow keys or WASD to move

-space bar or K to jump

The game can be considered a prototype, but can grow into a bigger game.

If you like the game please support it.

If you have any suggestions to make this game better don't hesitate to e-mail me at: andreidogaru99@gmail.com

If you want news about it check my twitter: @indieAlchemist
